description:
Game Machine refers specifically to the anime-only character who was responsible for directing and advising http://anidb.net/ch7481 [Luna] in regards to training the Sailor Senshi in the first season. He appeared as disembodied voice communicating through the Sailor V game located in Game Center Crown.
This was actually http://anidb.net/ch7490 [Artemis], but he continued to communicate with Luna this way even after he and Sailor Venus joined up with the rest of the Sailor Senshi. He was discovered by an unimpressed Luna when he damaged the equipment he was using to communicate in this manner and his image was broadcast on the game`s screen.
Source: wikimoon
name: Game Machine
